checks.name: ARIA Labels
checks.description: All interactive elements have ARIA labels

checks.name: Color Contrast
checks.description: Text meets WCAG AA contrast ratios

checks.name: Image Alt Text
checks.description: All images have descriptive alt text

checks.name: Focus Management
checks.description: Focus is properly managed and visible

checks.name: Screen Reader Support
checks.description: Content is accessible to screen readers

recommendations: Run manual tests with screen readers (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver)
Test keyboard navigation (Tab, Enter, Space, Arrow keys)
Test with axe DevTools browser extension
